name: Figures Saga
description:
The Figures Saga is a game that will make every moment. All you need is a phone and good reflexes! Try to catch as many figures as you can on the screen. Watch out because with the amount of points the game becomes more difficult and requires more attention. Try to catch the circle when it appears in the darker circle field by clicking on any area of the screen. More on video material.

-Leaderboard online! Challenge with others players!

-Achievement system - unlock your progress in game! Try to be the best!
